001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.protocol.http;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.ClockPort;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MessageReconstructor;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.port.MetricsPort;
006import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageEvent;
007import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageMetadata;
008import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.MessageType;
009import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.msg.TransactionId;
010import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.ByteStream;
011import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.net.FiveTuple;
012import ca.gc.cra.radar.domain.protocol.ProtocolId;
013import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
014import java.util.ArrayDeque;
015import java.util.ArrayList;
016import java.util.Deque;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Locale;
019import java.util.Map;
020
021/**
022 * Lightweight HTTP/1.x reconstructor that buffers per-direction payloads and emits complete
023 * header+body messages when Content-Length allows. Chunked bodies are emitted best-effort as a
024 * single payload containing the buffered bytes at the time of detection.
025 */
026public final class HttpMessageReconstructor implements MessageReconstructor {
027  private static final byte[] CRLFCRLF = "\r\n\r\n".getBytes(StandardCharsets.US_ASCII);
028
029  private final ClockPort clock;
030  private final HttpMetrics metrics;
031
032  private DirectionState client;
033  private DirectionState server;
034  private final Deque<String> pendingTransactionIds = new ArrayDeque<>();
035
036  /**
037   * Creates a reconstructor bound to the supplied clock and metrics sink.
038   *
039   * @param clock clock used for timestamping generated events
040   * @param metrics metrics sink for HTTP-specific counters
041   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code clock} or {@code metrics} is {@code null}
042   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
043   */
044  public HttpMessageReconstructor(ClockPort clock, MetricsPort metrics) {
045    this.clock = clock;
046    this.metrics = new HttpMetrics(metrics);
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Resets parser state at the beginning of a session.
051   *
052   * @implNote Clears buffers for both directions and pending transaction ids.
053   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
054   */
055  @Override
056  public void onStart() {
057    client = new DirectionState(true);
058    server = new DirectionState(false);
059    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
060  }
061
062  /**
063   * Parses HTTP bytes and emits zero or more message events.
064   *
065   * @param slice contiguous byte stream slice with flow metadata; must not be {@code null}
066   * @return list of message events extracted from the slice; may be empty
067   * @throws NullPointerException if {@code slice} is {@code null}
068   * @implNote Associates responses with the oldest unmatched request id; chunked bodies emit buffered bytes once detected.
069   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
070   */
071  @Override
072  public List<MessageEvent> onBytes(ByteStream slice) {
073    metrics.onBytes(slice.data().length);
074    DirectionState dir = slice.fromClient() ? client : server;
075    dir.append(slice);
076
077    List<ByteStream> messages = dir.drain(slice.flow());
078    List<MessageEvent> events = new ArrayList<>(messages.size());
079    for (ByteStream message : messages) {
080      boolean fromClient = message.fromClient();
081      MessageType type = fromClient ? MessageType.REQUEST : MessageType.RESPONSE;
082      String transactionId;
083      if (fromClient) {
084        transactionId = TransactionId.newId();
085        pendingTransactionIds.addLast(transactionId);
086      } else {
087        transactionId = pendingTransactionIds.isEmpty()
088            ? TransactionId.newId()
089            : pendingTransactionIds.removeFirst();
090      }
091      MessageMetadata metadata = new MessageMetadata(transactionId, Map.of());
092      events.add(new MessageEvent(ProtocolId.HTTP, type, message, metadata));
093    }
094    return events;
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Clears buffers at the end of the session.
099   *
100   * @implNote Pending transaction ids are dropped to avoid leaking across sessions.
101   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
102   */
103  @Override
104  public void onClose() {
105    pendingTransactionIds.clear();
106    client.reset();
107    server.reset();
108  }
109
110  private static final class DirectionState {
111    private final boolean fromClient;
112    private final GrowableBuffer buffer = new GrowableBuffer();
113    private long lastTimestamp;
114
115    DirectionState(boolean fromClient) {
116      this.fromClient = fromClient;
117    }
118
119    void append(ByteStream slice) {
120      buffer.write(slice.data());
121      lastTimestamp = slice.timestampMicros();
122    }
123
124    List<ByteStream> drain(FiveTuple flow) {
125      List<ByteStream> messages = new ArrayList<>();
126      while (true) {
127        int headerEnd = buffer.indexOf(CRLFCRLF);
128        if (headerEnd < 0) {
129          break;
130        }
131        int headersLen = headerEnd + CRLFCRLF.length;
132        byte[] headers = buffer.peek(headersLen);
133        int bodyLen = bodyLength(headers, fromClient);
134        if (bodyLen < 0) {
135          // chunked or unsupported framing: emit everything currently buffered
136          byte[] payload = buffer.pop(buffer.size());
137          messages.add(new ByteStream(flow, fromClient, payload, lastTimestamp));
138          break;
139        }
140        if (buffer.size() < headersLen + bodyLen) {
141          break; // wait for more bytes
142        }
143        byte[] payload = buffer.pop(headersLen + bodyLen);
144        messages.add(new ByteStream(flow, fromClient, payload, lastTimestamp));
145      }
146      return messages;
147    }
148
149    void reset() {
150      buffer.clear();
151      lastTimestamp = 0L;
152    }
153  }
154
155  private static int bodyLength(byte[] headers, boolean request) {
156    String head = new String(headers, StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1);
157    String lower = head.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT);
158
159    if (lower.contains("transfer-encoding:") && lower.contains("chunked")) {
160      return -1;
161    }
162
163    int contentLengthIdx = lower.indexOf("content-length:");
164    if (contentLengthIdx >= 0) {
165      int endLine = lower.indexOf('\n', contentLengthIdx);
166      if (endLine < 0) {
167        endLine = lower.length();
168      }
169      String value = lower.substring(contentLengthIdx + "content-length:".length(), endLine).trim();
170      try {
171        return Math.max(0, Integer.parseInt(value));
172      } catch (NumberFormatException ignore) {
173        return 0;
174      }
175    }
176
177    if (!request) {
178      String firstLine = firstLine(head);
179      if (firstLine.length() >= 12) {
180        // HTTP/1.x <status>
181        int codeStart = firstLine.indexOf(' ');
182        if (codeStart > 0 && codeStart + 3 <= firstLine.length()) {
183          try {
184            int code = Integer.parseInt(firstLine.substring(codeStart + 1, codeStart + 4));
185            if ((code >= 100 && code < 200) || code == 204 || code == 304) {
186              return 0;
187            }
188          } catch (NumberFormatException ignore) {
189            return 0;
190          }
191        }
192      }
193    }
194    return request ? 0 : 0;
195  }
196
197  private static String firstLine(String headers) {
198    int idx = headers.indexOf('\n');
199    if (idx < 0) {
200      return headers.trim();
201    }
202    return headers.substring(0, idx).trim();
203  }
204
205  private static final class GrowableBuffer {
206    private byte[] data = new byte[1024];
207    private int size;
208
209    void write(byte[] bytes) {
210      ensureCapacity(size + bytes.length);
211      System.arraycopy(bytes, 0, data, size, bytes.length);
212      size += bytes.length;
213    }
214
215    int size() {
216      return size;
217    }
218
219    byte[] pop(int len) {
220      byte[] out = new byte[len];
221      System.arraycopy(data, 0, out, 0, len);
222      int remaining = size - len;
223      if (remaining > 0) {
224        System.arraycopy(data, len, data, 0, remaining);
225      }
226      size = remaining;
227      return out;
228    }
229
230    byte[] peek(int len) {
231      byte[] out = new byte[len];
232      System.arraycopy(data, 0, out, 0, len);
233      return out;
234    }
235
236    int indexOf(byte[] needle) {
237      outer:
238      for (int i = 0; i <= size - needle.length; i++) {
239        for (int j = 0; j < needle.length; j++) {
240          if (data[i + j] != needle[j]) {
241            continue outer;
242          }
243        }
244        return i;
245      }
246      return -1;
247    }
248
249    void ensureCapacity(int capacity) {
250      if (data.length >= capacity) {
251        return;
252      }
253      int newCapacity = data.length;
254      while (newCapacity < capacity) {
255        newCapacity <<= 1;
256      }
257      byte[] next = new byte[newCapacity];
258      System.arraycopy(data, 0, next, 0, size);
259      data = next;
260    }
261
262    void clear() {
263      size = 0;
264    }
265  }
266}
267
